name: FetchSyncSyncListPermission
description: Fetch a specific Sync List Permission.

ListSid.description: Identifier of the Sync List. Either a SID or a unique name.

Identity.description: Arbitrary string identifier representing a user associated with an FPA token, assigned by the developer.

$ul: **account_sid**: The unique SID identifier of the Twilio Account.
**identity**: Arbitrary string identifier representing a human user associated with an FPA token, assigned by the developer.
**list_sid**: The unique SID identifier of the Sync List to which the Permission applies.
**manage**: Boolean flag specifying whether the identity can delete the Sync List.
**read**: Boolean flag specifying whether the identity can read the Sync List and its Items.
**service_sid**: The unique SID identifier of the Sync Service Instance.
**url**: Contains an absolute URL for this Sync List Permission.
**write**: Boolean flag specifying whether the identity can create, update and delete Items of the Sync List.
